ProgramBlock.ScriptSetup: Program .AddFeature("", SMART_DEVICE_TYPES, SMART_DEVICE_ENABLE, "Enable Smart Light Control", "checkbox") .AddFeature("", SMART_DEVICE_TYPES, SMART_DEVICE_MOTION_DETECT, "Controlled by sensor (optional)", "module.text:any:sensor:status.level,sensor.motiondetect") .AddFeature("", SMART_DEVICE_TYPES, SMART_DEVICE_CHECK_LUMINOSITY, "Controlled by luminance sensor (optional)", "module.text:any:any:sensor.luminance") .AddFeature("", SMART_DEVICE_TYPES, SMART_DEVICE_MIN_LUMINANCE, "Trigger if luminance is below", "slider:0:1000:10:300") .AddFeature("", SMART_DEVICE_TYPES, SMART_DEVICE_SWITCH_OFF_TIMEOUT, "Turn off after inactivity timeout (seconds)", "slider:30:3600:30:30") .Run();
